Birds Open Source

The aim of this project is to help low-budget teams in non-space faring nations by providing a more solid basis for satellite development. We know from experience that starting from scratch is too much work.

Backplane Board

###HBPB (Backplane without CPLD):

###SBPB (Backplane with CPLD):

This is the backplane board used in BIRDS 3 and 4. As previously mentioned, this boardâ€™s function is to connect all the other boards, including the mission ones, together. Specifically, the board in the first picture is the one without CPLD which is used to redirect connections when needed. HBPB is the board without CPLD. SBPB has CPLD.

The documentation for the BIRDS3 version of this board can be found here The documentation for the BIRDS4 version of this board can be found here
